Sports Day Announcements

NSFAS UPDATES

Minister Blade Nzimande briefs media on 2024 NSFAS application process, 27 Sept

The Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation, Dr Blade Nzimande, invites members of the media to the briefing on the opening of the 2024 National Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) application process.

Minister Nzimande will also give a report on the support that NSFAS has provided to students in the academic year 2023. This will include information about acccepted and rejected NSFAS appeals

The media briefing will take place as follows: Date: Tuesday, 27th of September 2023 ... Time: 16h00 Central African Time (CAT)... Venue: Ronnie Mamoepa Media Centre, Tshedimosetso House, 1035 Francis Baard Street, Hatfield
